message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only able to pay up to $85 for it.
I understand you're looking to save a bit on the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $90.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
I'm still a bit above $80, so I'm willing to go down to $92, but that's as low as I can go.
I see where you're coming from, Alice. I'd like to propose an offer of $88 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $89 for the product, but that's as low as I can go.
